我贴的数据是world bank 2017年的数据。看来world bank也不行，竟然没按照你说的发达国家只能和发达国家对比的“永恒真理”来做。

你说我的数据延迟（2年我觉得根本不会造成显著变化），那请你别说什么新闻里都有，贴上你的数据如何？如果world bank接受的是中国的人口“假”数据，那么我怎么知道你所谓的生育率跌下1，是“真”数据？你怎么证明呢？靠你脱口而出吗？

还有真的别脱口而出就误导群众了。。。
是有一个second demographic transition理论，但是和你所说的规定人口只能和发达国家相比没有半毛💰关系。。。。

根据https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demographic_transition 这个SDT理论主要是研究由于避孕措施，女性工作受教育选择不结婚等等因素造成的生育率变化。和你提的人口只能发达国家对比没有真的半毛钱关系。。。硬要扯发达国家，也只能说这一个概念框架是在1986年提出的针对从1963年后的所谓的industrilized(就算发达好了）国家里的北美和西欧对避孕手段发展和女性社会属性变化而使生育率下跌的调查构建的，也没有扯到日本。。。

以下是wikipedia的原文解释到底什么是SDT的：
"The Second Demographic Transition (SDT) is a conceptual framework first formulated in 1986 by Ron Lesthaeghe and Dirk van de Kaa in a short article that was published in the Dutch sociology journal Mens en Maatschappij.[46]:181[46][47][48] SDT addressed the changes in the patterns of sexual and reproductive behavior which occurred in North America and Western Europe in the period from about 1963, when the birth control pill and other cheap effective contraceptive methods such as the IUD were adopted by the general population, to the present. Combined with the sexual revolution and the increased role of women in society and the workforce the resulting changes have profoundly affected the demographics of industrialized countries resulting in a sub-replacement fertility level.[49]

The changes, increased numbers of women choosing to not marry or have children, increased cohabitation outside marriage, increased childbearing by single mothers, increased participation by women in higher education and professional careers, and other changes are associated with increased individualism and autonomy, particularly of women. Motivations have changed from traditional and economic ones to those of self-realization“
